question: 请解释这句话：Start a good Money Habit todayAnd build a solid foundation for tomorrow.Our ApproachSaveProtectGrowRetireHitting a new milestone in life? Planning for your future — whether it's a down payment on a house, funding a new venture, or securing a comfortable retirement — doesn't have to feel like a chore.Taking small, consistent steps to save, protect, grow and retire makes a big difference.We call them Money Habits.Adopting good Money Habits today builds a strong foundation for tomorrow. You’ll be better equipped to make informed decisions, stay resilient through tough times, and achieve your goals at every stage of life.We all need money for now and the futureSo it's important to understand the trade-offs you are making with your money, and make financial decisions that are right for you. Our 2025 Financial Wellness Report looks into the challenges you might face, and offers practical strategies to prepare for retirement. For the highlights, check out this article here.Be empowered to take actionTake advantage of our financial literacy library and tools to level up your financial know-how. Then take action to improve your financial wellness.DID YOU KNOW?There’s an AI-powered financial planning tool on your digibank app. Compared to non-users, customers who use it have:To try it out, tap on Plan in your digibank app.Here are the Money Habits to take you from your first paycheck to retirement. You’ll be better equipped to make informed decisions, stay resilient through tough times, and achieve your goals at every stage of life.We all need money for now and the futureSo it's important to understand the trade-offs you are making with your money, and make financial decisions that are right for you. Our 2025 Financial Wellness Report looks into the challenges you might face, and offers practical strategies to prepare for retirement. For the highlights, check out this article here.Be empowered to take actionTake advantage of our financial literacy library and tools to level up your financial know-how. Then take action to improve your financial wellness.DID YOU KNOW?There’s an AI-powered financial planning tool on your digibank app. Compared to non-users, customers who use it have:To try it out, tap on Plan in your digibank app.Here are the Money Habits to take you from your first paycheck to retirement. question: 请解释这句话：andOnce you have signed up, you will receive a S$5 cash reward if you link your DBS/POSB account(s) to your mobile number using PayNow. You will get another S$5 if you link your NRIC/FIN to PayNow.The first 1,500 Qualified Customers to complete both steps (i) and (ii) above during the same Qualifying Period will get the cash reward. Each person can receive up to S$10 cash reward in total.PayNow What is PayNow and how do I register for PayNow?If you have any questions about PayNow or related to PayNow registration, please refer here.Prize When can I expect to receive the prize if I am a qualified winner?You will receive the cash reward to your active DBS/POSB PayNow-linked account within 2 months after the corresponding qualifying period ends.Start and End DateCrediting Due Date1 Mar 2025 - 30 Apr 202530 Jun 20251 May 2025 - 30 Jun 202531 Aug 20251 Jul 025 - 31 Aug 202531 Oct 20251 Sep 2025 - 31 Oct 202531 Dec 20251 Nov 2025 - 31 Dec 202528 Feb 2026 If I fulfil the eligibility criteria but I unlink my DBS/POSB account(s) from PayNow using my mobile number and/or NRIC/FIN during the campaign period, do I still qualify for this Campaign?No, Qualified Customers who unlinked their DBS/POSB account(s) from PayNow using their NRIC/FIN and/or mobile number during the Qualifying Period will be disqualified to receive the Prize. I have linked different DBS/POSB accounts with PayNow – one to my mobile number and one to my NRIC/FIN, which account will I receive the prize?If you have linked different DBS/POSB accounts with PayNow - one to your mobile number and one to your NRIC/FIN, the PayNow-linked account via NRIC/FIN will take precedence over the one linked via mobile number for prize crediting. Please note that the prize shall be forfeited if your DBS/POSB PayNow-linked account(s) is terminated or suspended at the time of crediting. How will I know if I am one of the first 1,500 customers who qualify to receive the cash reward?If you are one of the first 1,500 Qualified Customers, you will receive a push notification on your digibank app within 2 months after the corresponding qualifying period ends. Be sure to enable notifications so that you can be kept informed on the status of the promotion. Learn more here.Others I have participated in the 2024 DBS/POSB PayNow Promotion, where can I find the Terms and Conditions?The 2024 DBS/POSB PayNow Promotion has ended on 31 December 2024. From now till 31 December 2025, get up to S$10 when you register for PayNow using your NRIC/FIN and Mobile Number via your preferred POSB/DBS account. It only takes a few minutes, it’s that easy! How it works Step 1Sign up for the promotion.Sign Up NowStep 2Register for PayNow using your NRIC/FIN and/or Mobile Number via your preferred POSB/DBS account.Up to S$10 Cash Reward Be one of the first 1,500 customers each qualifying period to be eligible for the cash reward. Refer to the table below for more information.Qualifying PeriodCrediting Due Date1 Mar – 30 Apr 2025 30 Jun 20251 May – 30 Jun 2025 31 Aug 20251 Jul – 31 Aug 202531 Oct 20251 Sep – 31 Oct 202531 Dec 20251 Nov – 31 Dec 202528 Feb 2026Terms & Conditions apply.If you’ve already registered your NRIC/FIN or Mobile Number for PayNow with a different bank, simply switch over and get rewarded – as long as you have no prior PayNow registration with DBS/POSB in the last 12 months before the start of each qualifying period.How to RegisterYou can register for PayNow via digibank Online or digibank Mobile.Register on digibank directly by clicking the ‘Register Now’ button below.Register NowAlternatively, you can register for PayNow by following these steps.On your digibank appLaunch digibank Mobile app and tap Login Tap Pay & TransferTap PayNowTap Your ProfileTap Register Your Mobile No. or Register Your NRIC/FINEnter your preferred nickname and account that will link with your PayNowReview information and tap Register Now On digibank online Log in to online bankingGo to ‘Transfer – To PayNow (Mobile Number, NRIC or UEN)’Click My RegistrationsClick Register my Mobile Number or Register my NRIC / FINFrequently Asked QuestionsEligibility Criteria What is the campaign period for this campaign?This campaign will run from 01 March 2025 till 31 December 2025, both dates inclusive. Who can participate in this campaign?The Campaign is open to all DBS/POSB customers with no prior PayNow registration with DBS/POSB in the last 12 months before the start of each qualifying period:Start and End DateNo PayNow Registration with DBS/POSB in the last 12 months1 Mar 2025 - 30 Apr 20251 Mar 2024 – 28 Feb 20251 May 2025 - 30 Jun 20251 May 2024 – 30 Apr 20251 Jul 025 - 31 Aug 20251 Jul 2024 – 30 Jun 20251 Sep 2025 - 31 Oct 20251 Sep 2024 – 31 Aug 20251 Nov 2025 - 31 Dec 20251 Nov 2024 – 31 Oct 2025If you’ve already registered your NRIC/FIN or Mobile Number for PayNow with a different bank, simply switch over and get rewarded – as long as you have no prior PayNow registration with DBS/POSB in the last 12 months before the start of each qualifying period. How do I qualify for this campaign?To take part in this offer, you need to:Sign up using the online form during the Qualifying Period
